p: Profiling of respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) antibody repertoires from the memory B cells of naturally infected adults [ 238] or generation of neutralizing antibodies from RSV-infected infants [ 239] has been undertaken as well. MEDI8897, an anti-RSV antibody developed by MedImmune, is currently being evaluated for safety and efficacy in Phase II clinical trial (NCT02878330).
